message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I see the value in this product, $12,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500. This would be a fair price for both of us, and it allows me to stay within my spending limit.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,500. This is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to your business.
